body_html:
I have the same issue. Any help would be appreciated.

Linux ubuntu 16.04 (x86_64)
TensorFlow version '1.4.1' and it was installed with 'pip3 install tensorflow-gpu'
CUDA V8.0.61
cuDNN 6
GPU: NVIDIA Corporation GK104 [GeForce GTX 770]
